Literature.Title: Evaluation of Antifungal Efficacy of Three New Cyclic Lipopeptides of the Class Bacillomycin from Bacillus subtilis RLID 12.1
Literature.Author: Ramachandran R, Shrivastava M, Narayanan NN, Thakur RL, Chakrabarti A, Roy U

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=16 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=14.53 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=15.69 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(MIC=7.51µg/ml),Candida albicans(MFC=7.51µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=7.19µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MFC=7.19µg/ml),Candida krusei(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Candida krusei(MFC=8-16µg/ml),Candida glabrata(MIC=7.05µg/ml),Candida glabrata(MFC=7.51µg/ml),Candida haemulonii(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida haemulonii(MFC=8µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MFC=8-16µg/ml),Candida auris(MIC=8.57µg/ml),Candida auris(MFC=10.55µg/ml),Candida viswanathii(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida viswanathii(MFC=4µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii(MIC=6.17µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii(MFC=6.17µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. gattii(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. gattii(MFC=4-8µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida auris NCCPF 470067(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida haemulonii ATCC 22991(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida krusei NCCPF 440022(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 2001(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NCCPF 450033(MIC=16µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=>32µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=13.04µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC80=16µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NCCPF 450033(MIC80=32µg/ml),Candida krusei NCCPF 440022(MIC80=32µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NCCPF 450033(MIC50=16µg/ml),Candida krusei NCCPF 440022(MIC50=16µg/ml)
